verbose_text: These altered SVP dynamics explain the lack of vesicle clusters in the distal axon of arl-8 mutants and argue that ARL-8 is required to activate UNC-104 / Kinesin-3-mediated axonal transport of SVPs when synaptic puncta are first forming.
evidence: ARL-8 is required to activate UNC-104/Kinesin-3-mediated axonal transport
